mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve mobile layout and text size for easier reading and navigation on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and implement lazy loading to reduce load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance meta tags and utilize more relevant keywords to improve search engine visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation clarity and streamline the booking process to make it more intuitive.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing the number of required fields and offering autofill options.
tips: Consider adding a FAQ section to address common customer inquiries.
Integrate live chat support for real-time assistance.
